item.title: [Global][PublicCloud] - OpenStack - RabbitMQ upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 3, 08:00 UTC  -  Aug 9, 10:00 UTC

Jun 21, 01:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/07/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 09/08/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : OpenStack API will be unavailable for 30min up to 2H during the operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for RabbitMQ (Message queue service).
The upgrade will be rolled out following this schedule :
w27 (03/07)
BHS1 03/07 08:00 UTC
SYD1 04/07 13:00 UTC
w28 (10/07)
BHS3 10/07 08:00 UTC
SGP1 11/07 13:00 UTC
DE1 12/07 19:00 UTC
w29 (17/07)
BHS5 17/07 08:00 UTC
WAW1 17/07 19:00 UTC
SBG5 18/07 19:00 UTC
GRA1 19/07 19:00 UTC
w30 (24/07)
GRA11 24/07 19:00 UTC
UK1 25/07 19:00 UTC
GRA5 26/07 19:00 UTC
SBG7 27/07 19:00 UTC
w31 (31/07)
US-WEST-OR1 31/07 08:00 UTC
GRA9 31/07 19:00 UTC
US-EAST-VA-1 01/08 08:00 UTC
w32 (07/08)
GRA7 07/08 19:00 UTC
GRA3 08/08 19:00 UTC

item.title: [Global][Public Cloud] - Object acces in the manager
item.description:
Jun 30, 16:16 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 29/06/2023 13:15 UTC
End time : 29/06/2023 16:02 UTC
Service status: The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.

Jun 30, 12:36 UTC
Identified - Start time : 29/06/2023 13:15 UTC
Service impact : Customer cannot list object from container via the manager.
Root cause : Bad integration of APIcall /cloud/project/{serviceName}/storage/access
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
